segments.text: We're on clearance sale now . Prices have up to twenty percent off . Do not miss the chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how about fifty percent discount ? If so , I'll buy that fur coat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Madam , you know we ’ re clearing out stock now . It ’ s a real bargain .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So won ’ t you come down any more ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thirty percent discount , OK ? That ’ s the lowest price .
segments.speaker: S1
